channel.title: raflines
channel.description: Best RSS Feed in South America

item.title: FISHIN' OUT
item.description:
Fish Game is finally fish out. Please play it now.
This is a game I made with my dear friend Faraway, whose post must be above mine, in a 3-day game jam. I asked my girlfriend to give us 2 themes and she gave us Bottom of the Sea and Stars. That is how we came up with Fish Game. That is all. I forgot to put Lil Bayes in the game so please leave me alone now.

The hero of our story is named Johnson Jonshon and you better get it right. The world is ending and all he wants is to catch stars.

item.title: ELEMENTAL CROSSING Version 1.3
item.description: Version 1.3 for ELEMENTAL CROSSING is now out! Check out patch notes here! This is mostly likely the last update of the game, fixes some bugs and makes the overall experience better. This update also adds MEDALS to the NEWGROUNDS version of the game, GO PLAY IT!!! IT'S LIKE CHRISTMAS OVER THERE!!!

item.title: ELEMENTAL CROSSING Version 1.2
item.description: A new update for Elemental Crossing has just been released, you can check the patch notes here! There might be a patch for this update coming out soon just to tie everything together but I believe the game is all done!

item.title: ELEMENTAL CROSSING Version 1.1
item.description: A major bug fix update has just been released for Elemental Crossing! Check it out here!

item.title: ELEMENTAL CROSSING is OUT!
item.description: My new game, ELEMENTAL CROSSING, is out! Go check it out over at Itch.io or Newgrounds! Elemental Crossing is a timewaster game where all you need to do is connect elements, so easy! so peasy! Please play it.

item.title: Introducing: RAFLINES RSS FEEDâ„¢
item.description:
I decided to implement my own RSS Feed on my site so I can automatically make blog posts! I am not sure how often I will post here but please enjoy.
